survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate passenger satisfaction with various aspects of airline travel, including in-flight services, boarding processes, and overall comfort.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall cleanliness of the aircraft?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall cleanliness of the aircraft?

questions.question_text: Which of the following in-flight services did you use during your flight? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections; include 'None of the above' option.

script.question_text: Which of the following in-flight services did you use during your flight? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the comfort of your seat?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear definitions for each rating to ensure consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate the comfort of your seat?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any delays during your journey?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture different types of delays.

script.question_text: Did you experience any delays during your journey?

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered during your flight.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any delay options in Q4
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback on specific issues.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered during your flight.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any delay options in Q4

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this airline to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this airline to others?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors influenced your overall satisfaction the most? (Select up to three)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to three to prioritize key factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with a maximum of three selections; optional field.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors influenced your overall satisfaction the most? (Select up to three)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other factors that influenced your satisfaction.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Other (please specify)' in Q7
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture additional feedback not covered in the options.

script.question_text: Please specify any other factors that influenced your satisfaction.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Other (please specify)' in Q7

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the boarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency with other satisfaction questions.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the boarding process?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving your airline experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture any final thoughts or suggestions.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving your airline experience?
